elections.name: 2023 USA
details: The election is to elect the president of the USA
Voting Starts on 2023-01-01.
Voting Ends on 2023-02-01

stages.title: Do you know the reason for the election?

elements.title: Background
details: The government election happens every 5 years.
The elections are held to ensure the governing body of the united states is performed by the party with the most elections.
elements.footer: This site has no affiliation with any party.

comments.comment: Should I vote in the election?
Yes, or you wont have your voice heard, and the wrong candidate could end up winning the election.

stages.title: Do you know the candidates for the election?

elements.title: Brian Yule
details: Party: Democrat
Election Promises: 1. healthcare, 2. environment

stages.title: Where can I go to discuss further?

elements.title: The live debates on TV.
details: You can watch the live debates on CNN on these dates:
Debate 1: Saturday 10th Jan 2023 on CNN at 8:30 EST
Debate 2: Saturday 30th Jan 2023 on CNN at 8:30 EST
elements.footer: This site has no affiliation with any TV or news channel.

elements.title: Boston Library
details: The Boston Library is hosting a discussion session on the election and candidates
This is happening on Saturday 8th Jan 2023 on the 2nd floor of the library at 8:30 EST
elements.footer: Seats are limited, and are on a first come, first serve basis.

comments.comment: Should I vote in the election?
Yes, or you wont have your voice heard, and the wrong candidate could end up winning the election.

stages.title: Do you know where to vote?

elements.title: Polling Station 1
details: Opening Hours : 9am to 5pm monday to friday
Please ensure you bring your id with address for verification.
Address: 123, out of the way, MA, USA
elements.footer: This site has no affiliation with any candidates.

elements.title: Polling Station 2
details: Opening Hours : 9am to 5pm monday to friday
Please ensure you bring your id with address for verification.
Address: 123, in of the way, PS, USA
elements.footer: This site has no affiliation with any candidates.

comments.comment: Should I vote in the election?
Yes, or you wont have your voice heard, and the wrong candidate could end up winning the election.

elements.title: Register to vote
details: Please go to www.gov.registration.com to register to vote.
Registration is required even if you are voting from outside the USA
elements.footer: If you do not register, you cannot vote

comments.comment: Should I vote in the election?
Yes, or you wont have your voice heard, and the wrong candidate could end up winning the election.

stages.title: Do you know how to submit a postal vote?

elements.title: Postal Vote
details: Please go to www.gov.registration.com to register to vote.
Registration is required even if you are voting from outside the USA
elements.footer: If you do not register, you cannot vote

comments.comment: Should I vote in the election?

elements.title: Success
details: Your ready to go.
You can now rest assured that your vote on the day will count.
elements.footer: We wish you and your candidate the very best in the up comming election.

comments.comment: Should I vote in the election?
